Name: Marker Seven Coastal Grill
Description: Seafood restaurant in a historical home featuring a seasonal menu, cocktails & a coastal vibe.

Name: Seabear Oyster Bar
Description: Chic, lively place with a popular happy hour offering oysters, eclectic seafood dishes & cocktails.

Name: Ru Sans
Description: Casual Japanese eatery with a large menu including yakitori, creative sushi rolls & seafood.

Name: Taqueria Tsunami
Description: Local Latin-Asian fusion chain serving tacos, quesadillas & bowls in a relaxed, stylish space.

Name: Agua Linda
Description: Family-owned eatery plating Mexican standards, from tacos to fajitas, in a warm, colorful setting.

Name: Tlaloc
Description: This compact eatery offers a sizable selection of traditional Mexican dishes in a casual setting.

Name: LongHorn
Description: Casual steakhouse chain known for grilled beef & other American dishes in a ranch-style space.

Name: Outback Steakhouse
Description: Boisterous Australian-themed chain serving steaks, seafood & other hearty steakhouse fare.

Name: Porterhouse Grill
Description: Polished, casual steakhouse offering classic meals & a wine list, plus live jazz on Wednesdays.
